tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE follow_up_actions (
  lead_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  lead_name VARCHAR(255),
  lead_status VARCHAR(50),
  follow_up_criteria VARCHAR(255),
  follow_up_action VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE Leads (
 lead_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 lead_name VARCHAR(50),
 lead_email VARCHAR(100),
 lead_status VARCHAR(20),
 follow_up_criteria VARCHAR(200)
);

CREATE TABLE FollowUpActions (
 action_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 action_type VARCHAR(50),
 action_description VARCHAR(200),
 action_due_date DATE,
 lead_id INT,
 FOREIGN KEY (lead_id) REFERENCES Leads(lead_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Leads (
    lead_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    lead_name VARCHAR(255),
    lead_email VARCHAR(255),
    lead_phone VARCHAR(15),
    lead_status VARCHAR(50)
);
